name: Returned as a Martial Genius
author: Kim Yi-Seung
content: Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. As Jun Leeâ€™s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...
